rules.text: NO: Flatly racist, casteist, ableist, sexist, transphobic, or otherwise chauvinistic and bigoted discourse
NO: Racist, misogynistic, homophobic, ableist slurs, or other derogatory pejoratives for oppressed identity groups (unless you belong to that group and are reclaiming the term)

NO: Symbols, slogans, memes/jokes, and vapid talking points associated with any part of the reactionary right, and the same for elements of the left advocating for genocide/mass killings in the name of authoritarian socialism or anti-imperialism
NO: Targeted harassment (i.e. evading blocks, repeated hostile replies, or posts intended to instigate brigading/dogpiling against a user), even for righteous reasons
NO: Pornographic and/or sexualized images without an CW (Content Warning).
NO: Messages promoting or encouraging pseudoscience, conspiracism, or breaks with reality
NO: Pornographic or sexualized imaged/videos where the subject did not consent.
